name: Pacsafe RFID safe V50 Compact Wallet - Unisex
description: A highly organized design meets top of the line security. This wallet is lined with RFID blocking material to block scanning and prevent identity theft. A detachable wrist strap tightens to your wrist if dropped or grabbed.Made of 210-denier nylon ripstop with a water-resistant coating.Lined with water-resistant 200-denier polyester.RFID blocking material keeps your identity safe.Detachable wrist strap is strong, light Dyneema and has a loop that tightens to your wrist if your wallet is accidentally dropped or snatched.Outer zippered coin pocket.2 slots for paper money.5 card slots including a mesh slot.
